title: PM pays homage to Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi
body_lines: Ahead of a crucial week, Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa visited Anuradhapura this morning to pay homage to the Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi.
Prime Minister also visited the Ruwanweli Maha Seya, one of the greatest historical Buddhist Monuments in Anuradhapura.
